programme.title: Gutshot Straight
programme.desc: A debt-ridden gambler (George Eads) gets in over his head when a mysterious high-roller (Stephen Lang) hires him for a job that has an unexpected condition attached.

programme.title: Haywire
programme.desc: After a successful mission to free a Chinese hostage, a highly trained operative (Gina Carano) is betrayed and left for dead by someone in her own agency.

programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: Two veteran detectives hunt a vigilante whose crimes resemble those of a killer they put behind bars long ago.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: Frank Castle, known as the Punisher, ruthlessly demolishes organized crime, but it starts an even bigger war.

programme.title: Tekken
programme.desc: Jin (Jon Foo) trains to fight Anvil after he witnesses him murdering his mother.

programme.title: Studio 666
programme.desc: Legendary rock band Foo Fighters move into an Encino mansion steeped in grisly rock and roll history to record their much anticipated 10th album.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Reno goes under cover to find two men who murdered a friend of his and whose beating put him in the hospital.

programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: Two veteran detectives hunt a vigilante whose crimes resemble those of a killer they put behind bars long ago.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: A death-row inmate from a Central American jail is among the prisoners taken to a remote island for a to-the-death match broadcast live over the Internet.

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: A former bounty hunter (Randy Orton) lands in a tournament where convicts fight to the death for an online audience.

programme.title: The Cold Light of Day
programme.desc: A vacation in Spain turns nightmarish when a man's (Henry Cavill) family is kidnapped by agents who are hell-bent on recovering a mysterious briefcase.

programme.title: Donnie Darko: The Director's Cut
programme.desc: An unusual teenager (Jake Gyllenhaal) follows the instructions of the 6-foot-tall rabbit which saved his life.

programme.title: Fire With Fire
programme.desc: A firefighter does something unexpected after a man that he has been ordered to testify against threatens him.

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: Two unseen scientists manipulate the gory goings-on at a backwoods cabin inhabited by a group of unsuspecting college friends (Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison).

programme.title: BKB 42: Music City Brawl
programme.desc: From June 21, 2025. Featuring Javon Wright vs. Carlos Alexandre, plus Jamie Driver vs. Helen Peralta in bare-knuckle boxing action from Nashville, Tenn.
